casebody.data:
HOUSE OF RAEFORD FARMS, INC.
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENT AND NATURAL RESOURCES. No. 301P15-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Aug. 26, 2015. Anita LeVeaux, Assistant Attorney General, Mary Louise Lucasse, Special Deputy Attorney General, for North Carolina Department of Environment and Natural Resources. Henry W. Jones, Jr., Lori P. Jones, Raleigh, for House of Raeford Farms, Inc.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of August 2015 by Respondent for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of August 2015."
